#summary errorMessagesFor(objectName)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a list (UL tag with a class of 'error-messages') containing all the error messages for all the properties of the object if any of the [ObjectValidation object validation] fails.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:
|| *objectName* || string || true ||  || The name of the object (model name) to display the error messages for ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
     #errorMessageFor(objectName="user")#
</cfoutput>
}}}
